title: Public S3 bucket exposure
description: Misconfigured S3 bucket may expose customer data.

title: Model prompt injection
description: LLM-based agent could follow adversarial instructions and exfiltrate secrets.

title: Excessive IAM privileges
description: Overly broad IAM roles may allow unintended production access.

title: Software supply-chain compromise
description: Malicious dependency or compromised GitHub token leads to code tampering.

title: GCP service account key exposure
description: Long-lived keys checked into a repo or leaked in logs.

title: Kubernetes cluster lateral movement
description: Insufficient network policies allow attacker to pivot between namespaces.
